title: The State of the Earth
content:
GUESTS: Jane Goodall, renowned anthropologist and regarded by many as humanity’s mouthpiece for the voices of the... <!--more--> animal kingdom.
She is the founder of the Jane Goodall Institute and Roots and Shoots, a global environmental and humanitarian program to motivate young people around the world to face the important challenges awaiting them.
Her new book “Seeds of Hope” will be released in Autumn.
Vandana Shiva, internationally renown environmental and social activists, regarded as a leading pioneer behind India’s ecological and ecofeminist movement.
She is founder of Navdanya, an organization dedicated to the restoration of organic farming across India and the preservation of indigenous knowledge and culture.
